means: 保护主义，贸易保护制度

sentence.Network_en: Shrill voices on both sides of the Atlantic are advocating protectionism.
sentence.Network_cn: 大西洋两岸都在大肆鼓吹贸易保护主义。

sentence.Network_en: Racial quotas and protectionism are scaring away some foreign investors.
sentence.Network_cn: 种族配额和保护主义吓跑了一些外国投资者。

sentence.Network_en: High interest rates and protectionism in potential export markets worsened the current account balance.
sentence.Network_cn: 高利率和潜在的出口市场上的保护主义使经常帐户的情况更加恶化.

entry.def: Protectionism is the policy some countries have of helping their own industries by putting a large tax on imported goods or by restricting imports in some other way.

example.ex: ...talks to promote free trade and avert increasing protectionism.
example.tran: 为促进自由贸易和遏制贸易保护主义抬头进行的谈判

means.word_mean: 1. the policy of imposing duties or quotas on imports in order to protect home industries from overseas competition
